entries.journal_entry_description: Aid the Emperor in his plan to manipulate the Queen of Naboo into revealing the location of a Rebel General she is believed to be hiding.
entries.journal_entry_title: The Emperor and the Queen, Part III
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: It is now time to offer proof of the Empires innocence and to place the blame with the Rebels. Travel to the mercenary base and exterminate them.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Deliver the datadisk to the Queen to show that a team of undercover Rebel operatives are acting against her. The datadisk is proof. Ask her to reveal the location of the Rebel General as a sign of good faith.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Deliver the Disk to the Queen
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Now that the Queen has turned against the Rebels, find and eliminate the Rebel General she had been hiding, General Jacen Nire.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Return to Emperor Palpatine at his retreat on Naboo.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Retrieve the datadisk from the mercenary leader. They will be presented to the Queen as a team of undercover Rebel operatives with the datadisk as proof.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Kill the mercenary leader, Vurrha Jantsk.
